description: Fired when a general system‐level error occurs that isn’t tied to a specific action failure.

payloadSchema.title: Core: System Error Occurred Event Payload
payloadSchema.description: Defines the payload structure for the 'core:system_error_occurred' event, used for reporting general system‐level errors.

message.description: Required. A user‐facing message describing the error.

details.description: Optional. Additional technical details about the error.

statusCode.description: Optional. Numeric code (e.g., HTTP status) associated with the error.

url.description: Optional. URI related to the error, if applicable.

raw.description: Optional. Raw error text or payload for debugging.

stack.description: Optional. Stack trace string for debugging.

timestamp.description: Optional. ISO 8601 timestamp of when the error occurred.
